DataElement.preferredName: Nausea Vomiting Risk Factor History Smoking Status Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of their smoking status.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Nausea Vomiting Risk Factor History Smoking Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The sensation that one is about to vomit._The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth._Anything that increases a person's chance of developing a disease. Some examples of risk factors for cancer include a family history of cancer, use of tobacco products, certain foods, exposure to radiation or cancer-causing agents, and certain genetic alterations._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The sensation that one is about to vomit.:The reflex act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth.:Anything that increases a person's chance of developing a disease. Some examples of risk factors for cancer include a family history of cancer, use of tobacco products, certain foods, exposure to radiation or cancer-causing agents, and certain genetic alterations.

Concepts.definition: Upper abdominal discomfort associated with an urge to vomit.
Forceful ejection of the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
Any aspect of an individual's life, behavior, an environmental exposure, or an inborn or inherited characteristic that increases the likelihood of a disease, condition or injury.

Property.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Duke U. Brain study per request by M.Leonard. mc 8/9/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text descriptors of a person's smoking status.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

Concepts.definition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added OBIB alternate name and identifier DW 03-21-2019

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who was not smoking at the time of the interview but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.

Concepts.definition: A person who has quit smoking at the time of the interview but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).: A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).
A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.:Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for Duke U. Brain study per request by M.Leonard. mc 8/9/13
